scripts.cf:dev: npm run build && wrangler pages dev dist
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.cf:deploy:preview: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.cf:deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --branch production
scripts.cf:db:export: npx wrangler@latest d1 export order_ieeja_orders --remote --output backup.sql
scripts.cf:db:import: npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --file backup.sql
scripts.cf:db:sync: npm run cf:db:export && npm run cf:db:reorder && npm run cf:db:import
scripts.cf:db:refresh: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('./.wrangler/state', { recursive: true, force: true });" && npm run cf:db:sync
scripts.cf:db:users: npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --local --command "SELECT phone, role, status FROM users;"
scripts.cf:db:users:remote: npx wrangler@latest d1 execute order_ieeja_orders --remote --command "SELECT phone, role, status FROM users;"
